__e: You ain't nothing like us. Because you don't look like us.
No sense being a hero if you don't look like one.
If you've been up all night, how come you don't look like...
She knows you look differently than she or I.
I thought you just showed up, and if you looked like you made enough mistakes in life, they let you on.
Back to normal, great idea, but maybe you should consider not going back... until it looks like you didn't just go through a windshield.
